name: HO LINH
about: I have about two years experience in Accounting, my skills are: Microsoft Office, English, Communication, Team Work, Work Independently.

experiences.description:
Main responsibilities:
- In charge of internal accounting work.
- Recognize revenue, cost daily relating to Contractors and Supplier.
- Prepare weekly bank payments
- Check and record the Contractor Contract
- Check all accounting documents as payables and receivables, the input and output documents
- Maintain and update daily transactions with accounting software (FAST)
- Maintain associated depreciation schedules for all fixed assets, tools and allocate prepaid expenses.
- Prepare financial statements in accordance with Vietnamese Accounting Standards. 
- Prepare tax reports including VAT, CIT, FCT, Invoice usage reports, Declare Business-license tax and submit to Tax Department on time regulations.
- Prepare necessary documents required by Tax Authority
- Other tasks assign by Manager.
Main responsibilities: - In charge of internal accounting work. - Recognize revenue, cost daily relating to Contractors and Supplier. - Prepare weekly bank payments - Check and record the Contractor Contract - Check all accounting documents as payables and receivables, the input and output documents - Maintain and update daily transactions with accounting software (FAST) - Maintain associated depreciation schedules for all fixed assets, tools and allocate prepaid expenses. - Prepare financial statements in accordance with Vietnamese Accounting Standards. - Prepare tax reports including VAT, CIT, FCT, Invoice usage reports, Declare Business-license tax and submit to Tax Department on time regulations. - Prepare necessary documents required by Tax Authority - Other tasks assign by Manager.
Skills: Accounting Software fluently (Misa, Fast,..) · Complete Financial Statements · Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Power BI, Powerpoint) · English

experiences.description:
Main responsibilities:
- In charge of internal accounting work.
- Recognize revenue, cost daily
- Review and analyzation monthly Revenue, COGS
- Check all accounting documents as payables and receivables, the input and output documents
- Maintain and update daily transactions with accounting software (MISA)
- Maintain associated depreciation schedules for all fixed assets, tools and allocate prepaid expenses.
- Prepare financial statements in accordance with Vietnamese Accounting Standards. 
- Master client contract information: the pricing, client information, terms of payment, terms of delivery… by co-ordinate with the sales department
- Prepare tax reports including VAT, CIT, FCT, Invoice usage reports, Declare Business-license tax and submit to Tax Department on time regulations.
- Prepare necessary documents required by Tax Authority
- Prepare Labour Contract, support to calculate salary, social insurance
- Other tasks assign by Manager.

educations.institution_name: University Of Economics Ho Chi Minh City
educations.description:
I am a sociable person, who can adapt to work under pressure with strengths: confident, careful, creative, patient and responsible at work. During 6 years of studying and working, I have gained broad experience in accounting. I am looking for a job related to my field of study to learn and develop my knowledge and skills. I also love a career where I can work with other people in a dynamic and professional workplace to get experience.
In the future, I want to become a good Manager in order to contribute to Company growth and one of the roles of the Company.
educations.activities:
- Lawrence S. Ting Scholarship of Lawrence S. Ting's Memorial Fund (in 2016) is my motivation to follow my passion. 
- First prize (with my team) in Economic Law Competition organized by Law Faculty of University of Economics, HCMC in 2015 and keep championship in 2016
- UEH scholarship for Top Students 2015 and 2016
- Student of 5 Merits of Student Association School of Accounting
- Member of Social Work Team of University of Economic, HCMC
